name: I MAED A GAM3 W1TH Z0MBIES 1N IT!!!1
name_original: I MAED A GAM3 W1TH Z0MBIES 1N IT!!!1
description:
DISCLAIMER! THIS GAME CONTAINS A LOT OF LIGHTS AND RAPIDLY FLASHING IMAGES

Hey now, a free Z0MB1ES PC fan port! https://t.co/FFUDUUnd60 by @DcrewGames

It's keyboard+mouse only but playable online with some port finagling!

Now to find the Time Viking source...
— James Silva (@Jamezila) September 29, 2021

Created using the original source code provided to me by Ska Studios' James Silva himself! I brought it to PC with Online Co-Op! and with James Silva's permission, I'm now sharing it on itch.io for free!

I haven't been able to gather a group of friends to record a gameplay video but since it's a direct port of the original I provided a link to a video of the game on console

Read more about the game here: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/I_Made_a_Game_with_Zombies_in_It!
